name: Mega Quiz Gaming
description:
🖥 Mega quiz gaming: PC version!
Guess all the game quiz levels with over 250 video games that has been a trending until this last year (2024).
Complete this video game trivia where you must guess a lot of video games through clever, humorous and extravagant emoji hieroglyphics.

----- Mega Quiz Gaming features -----

👤 Single & party game:
Play solo or bring the fun to house parties with friends.
💬 Tiktok and Twitch chat game:
Connect to any of your stream platforms, allowing your viewers to play directly from the chat.
🎮 Plenty of levels:
Over 250 different emoji hieroglyphs with an unlockable progression.
👾 Trending games:
Puzzles include from classic games to the upcoming releases of 2024.
💡 Hint system:
Get free hints that reload every few minutes.
🏆 Highscores:
Join the global leaderboard by answering all the gaming questions.

----- Twitch and Tiktok chat integration -----

🔴 Stream:
Available with Twitch and Tiktok live streams where your viewers can play by only using the chat.
🎮 Normal gamemode:
Play on LIVE alongside your viewers as they solve levels, but without spoiling any answers for you.
💤 AFK gamemode:
Go AFK and let your audience engage in a competitive challenge, solving randomized levels in an endless mode.
📈 Growth:
Empower your LIVE interactions and increase your channel visibility in the platform.
🏆 Viewer scores:
Check your followers' session scores, perfect for giveaways and raffles.

----- Steam version -----

This trivia game is a PC version for the Mega Quiz Gaming app, available for free in Mobile devices.

🎥 Easier streams:
Adapted for PC for easy streaming.
✅ Emoji gamemode:
Guess the games through emoji hieroglyphs.
❌ Shape mode:
Guess the games through their characters, weapons or hats. This gamemode is exclusive for mobile version.
⌨ Keyboard:
Use your physic keyboard to type a quicker answer.
🏆 Independent highscores:
PC players only compete on the PC leaderboards.


The main purpose of #MegaQuizGaming is to show the people the great variety of video games that surround us in a funny way. In #MegaQuizGaming, great titles are mixed with other independent titles, creating a list where players can distance themselves from their usual titles and discover new projects.
